events.message: I ordered a jacket last month but it never arrived, I want a refund for this purchase as soon as possible.
Classified the customer's issue under 'Refund' based on the request for money back due to non-delivery.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah for further assistance regarding the refund request.
Hello, this is Sarah from support. I understand you have not received your jacket and would like a refund.
Could you please provide your order number and any confirmation details so I can verify your purchase?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890 and I received a confirmation email on May 10th.
Thank you for the details. I have processed a full refund to your original payment method, which should appear in your account within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate the refund being processed so fast.
The refund has been confirmed and the case is now resolved from our side.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Thank you very much for the excellent support!
Closing the case as the refund has been received and the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
